summary: The lovable bat Bartok (Hank Azaria) goes on his own adventure and meets a pink snake, a dapper bear, Prince Ivan Romanov (Phillip Van Dyke), and evil witch Baba Yaga (Andrea Martin) trying to rule all of Russia.
cast: Hank Azaria|Kelsey Grammer|Andrea Martin|Catherine O'Hara|Tim Curry|Jennifer Tilly|Phillip Van Dyke|Diedrich Bader|Liz Callaway|Kelly Marie Berger|Ted Brunetti|Zach Charles|Danny Mann|John Schiappa|Glenn Shadix|French Stewart
keywords: prince|bat|witch|animal character name as title|spin off
title: Bártok el Magnífico
